name: revit.get_element_info
description: Retrieves detailed information about a Revit element by its element ID, including category, type, parameters, and geometry bounds.

element_id.description: The Revit element ID to look up

include_parameters.description: Whether to include all element parameters in the response

include_geometry.description: Whether to include bounding box geometry

examples.description: Get basic info about a wall element
